sources.title: Afterglow (1997) A Twisted Game of Partner Swap, When Marriages Mingle - 4K
sources.description:
Lucky Mann and his wife Phyllis find their marriage in a twist when they cross paths with the young Byron couple, Marianne and Jeffrey. As secrets slip and sparks fly, these four get tangled in each other’s lives with more surprises than a game of musical chairs.

Director & Writer: Alan Rudolph

Main cast:
Nick Nolte - Lucky Mann
Julie Christie - Phyllis Mann
Lara Flynn Boyle - Marianne Byron
Jonny Lee Miller - Jeffrey Byron

Genres: Comedy, Drama, Romance
Release date: 1997-09-12 
Filming location: Montreal, Quebec, Canada

Uncensored version: https://youtu.be/0dd74-U3_6Y

metadata.Plot: Two families are unhappy with their respective relationships: first of ambitious businessman Jeffrey Byron and sexually frustrated Marianne and second of repair contractor Lucky Mann and former B-movie actress Phyllis. When Lucky arrives to Byron's apartment to make some minor repair and Marianne becomes obsessed with him, the everyday balance breaks.
